text: Babatunde Raji Fashola, SAN (Yoruba: Babátúndé Rájí Fáshọlá; born 28 June 1963) is a Nigerian lawyer, politician and current Federal Minister of Works and Housing. He served two terms as Governor of Lagos State. == References == Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Lagos Category:Nigerian lawyers
title: Babatunde Fashola
